title: bAla pAhi
sahitya:
bAla pAhi vaudEva dEvakI bAla pAhi shaurE
nIla mEgha sannibha sharIra jagan mOhanAnga nrharE


caraNam 1    nandagOpa sukumAra yashOdA puNyarUpa viSNO
  manhahAsa vadana gOpikAjana ramaNa pAhi krSNA
  caraNam 2    dIna sharaNya draupadi mAna samrakSaNa dhurINA
  dAnava shishupAla kamsardayakita kAla kamala caraNA
  caraNam 3    nAradhAdi yOgi brnda vandita vENugAna lOlA
  nIrajAkAa bhaktajana kalpataru rUpa suguNa jAlA
  caraNam 4    kAmitArtha phala dAyaka pArthasArathE jaya vibhO
  rAmadAsa sannuta ananya sharaNam maam pAhi prabhO gO-
